infos.value: Nngh... This defense is locked tight...
Hah... I know not whether to praise your masons or curse them.
S-sorry...
Yet we can't afford to retreat now, can we?
The reason being...?
From what I can see, that rat Sadali has not yet infiltrated the castle.
Meaning that reinforcements are yet to come?
Exactly.
The longer we take, the more dire our situation becomes...
Lord Mont!
Lilyth? What is it?
It's King Oelde...
Father!? What happened?
No, he's still with the rearguard having his wounds treated...
I see. That's a relief.
You had me worried that his wounds had somehow worsened.
Lilyth?
King Oelde has gathered soldiers together and begun giving out orders.
I dug around for information, and it seems that he's attempting to embark for the battlefield.
Impossible. With those wounds, he...
I fear the same.
I must hold this position here. Can I trust you to handle Father?
As always.
Father... Just what are you thinking?
